capability.name: Financial Instrument Reference Data Management
capability.definition: This Service Domain maintains a directory of financial instrument reference data
capability.role: Maintain a central reference directory of market traded asset/instrument details. The details are typically captured from one or more specialist market feeds that publish market asset/instrument details. It can include the result of internal reference data processing
capability.example: A corporate financial advisory project references different instrument specifications when assembling a structured financial approach to the customer financing needs

key_features.name: Consolidate reference data from market sources
key_features.description: Enables consolidate reference data from market sources to support this service domain maintains a directory of financial instrument reference data

key_features.name: Classify and verify reference data
key_features.description: Enables classify and verify reference data to support this service domain maintains a directory of financial instrument reference data

key_features.name: Organize reference data for ease of access
key_features.description: Enables organize reference data for ease of access to support this service domain maintains a directory of financial instrument reference data

key_features.name: Provide access to instrument reference data
key_features.description: Enables provide access to instrument reference data to support this service domain maintains a directory of financial instrument reference data
